scripts.start:run: cross-env concurrently "yarn workspace server start" "yarn workspace reactweb start " "yarn workspace common start"
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "yarn workspace server dev" "yarn workspace reactweb start " "yarn workspace common start"
scripts.build: cross-env yarn workspace common build && concurrently "yarn workspace server build" "yarn workspace reactweb build "
scripts.lint:fixAll: yarn workspace server eslint --fix && yarn workspace reactweb eslint --fix
